Type of Differential

RBC Morphology
RBC Morphology
Impression and Plan
Plan
1. Heme - h/o SCA .
Admitted in crisis .
On Aranesp .
On Oxycontin TID and prn po / IV Dilaudid .
Palliative Care recommends that the IV Dilaudid be d/c and Dilaudid 10 mg po substituted - patient has only had oral Dilaudid today .
IV Dilaudid d/c by Dr. **NAME[ZZZ] .
2. Pulmonary - h/o asthma - Duonebs prn ; PNA - Cefepime d/c 'd - completed full course .
On po prednisone - adjusted as needed .
Will obtain CXR as patient c/o SOB today .
3. HEENT - Group A Strep Throat - Completed 10 day Amoxil course .
Otalgia / including hearing loss - ENT c/s - Floxin Otic - completed course .
Improved hearing .
4. Cardiology - h/o A-Fib .
On Cardizem 60 mg QID - continue to monitor .
5. GI - Hepatic encephalopathy - Lactulose BID .
Ammonia = 30 .
6. Renal - **INITIALS - will d/c Lasix .
Appreciate Renal c/s - Renal US
- IMPRESSION :
1. ECHOGENIC KIDNEYS COMPATIBLE WITH RENAL PARENCHYMAL DISEASE , WHICH CORRELATES WITH RECENT ABDOMINAL MR FINDINGS .
2. NO HYDRONEPHROSIS .
3. SMALL TO MODERATE PELVIC ASCITES .
s/p Tunneled Vaxcel HD catheter **DATE[Apr 30 07] .
For HD today .
7. Neurological - Diffuse weakness of extremities .
CT head negative .
PT / OT .
Pt 's strength is improving .
8. Vascular - RUE swelling and pain - RUE doppler negative .
9. Prophylaxis - SQ Heparin , interrupted for TDC .
Continue .
10. Endocrine - h/o DM - sub - optimal accuchecks .
11. Disposition - Arrangements in process by discharge planning for home with PT .
Dialysis Tuesday , Thursday , Saturday .
Family contacts :
Daughter **NAME[VVV] **PHONE ( **PLACE ); Mother **PLACE **PHONE ( Arizona ) .
